description: Returns information about a specific channel.

parameters.name: Channel
parameters.description: The ARN or UUID of a channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an channel returned by a GetChannel request.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudTrail channel. For service-linked channels, the name is aws-service-channel/service-name/custom-suffix where service-name represents the name of the Amazon Web Services service that created the channel and custom-suffix represents the suffix generated by the Amazon Web Services service.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The source for the CloudTrail channel.

nested_items.name: SourceConfig
nested_items.description: Provides information about the advanced event selectors configured for the channel, and whether the channel applies to all Regions or a single Region.

nested_items.name: ApplyToAllRegions
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the channel applies to a single Region or to all Regions.

nested_items.name: AdvancedEventSelectors
nested_items.description: The advanced event selectors that are configured for the channel.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: An optional, descriptive name for an advanced event selector, such as 'Log data events for only two S3 buckets'.

nested_items.name: FieldSelectors
nested_items.description: Contains all selector statements in an advanced event selector.

nested_items.name: Field
nested_items.description: A field in a CloudTrail event record on which to filter events to be logged. For event data stores for CloudTrail Insights events, Config configuration items, Audit Manager evidence, or events outside of Amazon Web Services, the field is used only for selecting events as filtering is not supported.

nested_items.name: Equals
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the exact value of the event record field specified as the value of Field. This is the only valid operator that you can use with the readOnly, eventCategory, and resources.type fields.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StartsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the first few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EndsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the last few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotEquals
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the exact value of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotStartsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the first few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotEndsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the last few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Destinations
nested_items.description: The destinations for the channel. For channels created for integrations, the destinations are the event data stores that log events arriving through the channel. For service-linked channels, the destination is the Amazon Web Services service that created the service-linked channel to receive events.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of destination for events arriving from a channel. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the value is EVENT_DATA_STORE. For service-linked channels, the value is AWS_SERVICE.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the location is the ARN of an event data store that receives events from a channel. For service-linked channels, the location is the name of the Amazon Web Services service.

nested_items.name: IngestionStatus
nested_items.description: A table showing information about the most recent successful and failed attempts to ingest events.

nested_items.name: LatestIngestionSuccessTime
nested_items.description: The time stamp of the most recent successful ingestion of events for the channel.

nested_items.name: LatestIngestionSuccessEventID
nested_items.description: The event ID of the most recent successful ingestion of events.

nested_items.name: LatestIngestionErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for the most recent failure to ingest events.

nested_items.name: LatestIngestionAttemptTime
nested_items.description: The time stamp of the most recent attempt to ingest events on the channel.

nested_items.name: LatestIngestionAttemptEventID
nested_items.description: The event ID of the most recent attempt to ingest events.
